scripts.mode:mainnet: cp subgraph-modes/mainnet.yaml subgraph.yaml && cp src/utils/consts-modes/mainnet_consts.ts src/utils/consts.ts && graph codegen
scripts.mode:kovan: cp subgraph-modes/kovan.yaml subgraph.yaml && cp src/utils/consts-modes/kovan_consts.ts src/utils/consts.ts && graph codegen
scripts.mode:polygon: cp subgraph-modes/polygon.yaml subgraph.yaml && cp src/utils/consts-modes/polygon_consts.ts src/utils/consts.ts && graph codegen
scripts.mode:avalanche-test: cp subgraph-modes/avalanche-test.yaml subgraph.yaml && cp src/utils/consts-modes/avalanche_consts.ts src/utils/consts.ts && graph codegen
scripts.build-contract: solc contracts/Gravity.sol --abi -o abis --overwrite && solc contracts/Gravity.sol --bin -o bin --overwrite
scripts.deploy:production: yarn codegen && graph deploy josephsaw/v3 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn codegen && graph deploy ngfam/pendle --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $SUBGRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN
scripts.deploy:mainnet-staging: yarn codegen && graph deploy josephsaw/mainnetstaging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $JOSEPH_SUBGRAPH
